entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:36 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
